title: Because someone is toxic/trolling it doesn't make u able to be toxic aswell.
body:
Just like that. If u flame anyone back, u deserve the same report.
I hate those players when they are shouting and flaming at some players that they intended to hate, spaming in all chat "Report this ape" but they forget how toxic they actually are, as the hate and anger consumed them.

replies.body:
Correction:
If you're a streamer endorsed by riot, you can do whatever the hell you want.

Here's a solution. Just use the mute button and stop crying like babies because someone said something online you didn't like....  unreal the generation being raised these days..... not even snowflakes... straight up water drops....

Idc about people's feelings about words. I care that you derail the game with petty arguements. So i agree, I will report the person who started it, anyone trolling/inting, and anyone who jumps in to continue a pointless arguement.
